# Police BMW Motorcycle (Group 2) Tender Announcement
## RFP Number: M5000-23-4441 / A

### Date Posted: 2023-05-27
### Tender Closing Date: 2023-06-20T16:00:00

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is seeking a procurement for seven (7) BMW R 1250 RT-P motorcycles and ancillary products. The solicitation is open to all eligible suppliers.

### Basis of Selection
Tenders will be evaluated based on their responsiveness to the requirements outlined in the solicitation and their compliance with the mandatory technical evaluation criteria. The bid with the lowest evaluated price will be recommended for contract award.

### Evaluation Criteria
The following evaluation criteria will be used to assess tenders:

* Responsiveness to the requirements outlined in the solicitation
* Technical capability to deliver the required products
* Price

### Limitations
The procurement is not subject to limited tendering provisions, and all eligible suppliers are invited to participate.

### Procurement Method
The procurement will be conducted using a competitive, selective tendering process.

### Contract Term
The anticipated contract start date is July 1, 2023, and the contract end date is February 29, 2024.

### Contact Information
For more information or to submit a tender, please contact:

Lianne Hopkie
SR Procurement Officer
NWR, Procurement and Contracting Unit
RCMP Academy Depot Division
5600-11th Ave, Regina, SK S4P 3J7
Phone: 639-625-3630
Email: lianne.hopkie@rcmp-grc.gc.ca

### Funding
The procurement is funded by the RCMP.

### Attachments
Tender documents and related information can be downloaded from the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) at https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities.
